item.description:
Join us for a great end of Winter meetup on Thursday March 18th(after all the crazyness goes away from the previous night of St. Patty's Day relicking) at the Riverhouse in downtown Portsmouth.

Our friends at WXGR 101.5 FM will be hosting the last Winter Chill music series from 9 pm-11 pm
at the Riverhouse on Bow Street in downtown Portsmouth.

There will be great live music, drink specials from Stella Artois and specials on glasses of wine
along with awesome raffle prizes!!

This cocktail meetup is FREE and will be a great time for all!
item.name: Cocktail Meetup @ The Riverhouse in Portsmouth
